name: Text Adventure based Horror EARLY DEMO
name_original: Text Adventure based Horror EARLY DEMO
description:
Play as a high schooler named Alec, as he tries to figure out what is wrong with his town. Very early demo, very short. Watch out for homophobia, bullying, death, body horror, and peril. Thank you for checking my game out! (LGBT themes are not as apparent in the demo, but the finished product will be heavily LGBT)

also there is swearing so yes watch out for that
